title: Ping Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration file for the Ping sound notification plugin. Place at ~/.claude/ping-config.json

enabled.description: Enable or disable all ping sounds. Set to false to mute the plugin completely.

soundsDir.description: Directory containing sound files. Can be an absolute path or relative to home directory (supports ~/ prefix). If not specified, uses the plugin's built-in sounds directory.

sounds.description: Per-sound overrides. Specify custom filenames for each event type, or set to empty string to disable a specific sound.

sessionStart.description: Sound file for session-start event. Use empty string "" to disable this sound.

userPrompt.description: Sound file for user-prompt event. Use empty string "" to disable this sound.

notification.description: Sound file for notification event. Use empty string "" to disable this sound.

stop.description: Sound file for stop event. Use empty string "" to disable this sound.
